entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui-Blazor (Hybrid) MacCatalyst app will not run on older MacOS #19808
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Button.LineBreakMode Does Not Appear to Truncate in this Context: StackLayout > Border > Grid > Button #19806
    Backlog
  • SVG Images from my nuget package not getting displayed and gives file not found exception. #19804
  • Setting Binding on Span GridItemsLayout results in NullReferenceException #19803
    Backlog
  • Label with TextType="Html" looks completely different on iOS and Android #19802

Closed

  • Custom Build Configurations require explicit iOS RuntimeIdentifier values in the csproj file. Can I set these using Conditions? #19235
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]Entering some text by PC keyboard or On-Screen Keyboard won't make the label turn green for API33 emulator. #18370
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Android] Entry and KeyPress event on Enter key (hardware keyboard) #19072
    Backlog
  • System.InvalidOperationException: NavHost cannot be null #19809
  • [regression/8.0.3] DataTrigger do not restore the original value anymore #18976
    Backlog
  • publishing Blazor Hybrid MacCatalyst app removes +x on helper apps #19741
  • [testing] GroupListViewHeaderIndexOutOfRangeTest test is failing on IOS #19755
    Backlog
  • UI components not filling parent container #14526
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Make `PointerOver` to have higher priority than `Focused` state #19812
    community ✨
  • [Android] FlyoutIsPresented property opens the Flyout #19807
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢

Merged

  • Enable string search and comparison CA rules in Core #19796
    area/controls 🎮
  • Update bug-report.yml with 8.0.5 #19795
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Handle setting of DesiredSize in Measure implementations, rather than MeasureOverride #19794
    area/layout 🔲
  • [X] passing test for 18976 #19785
    area/Xaml </>
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19769
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Move GroupListViewHeaderIndexOutOfRange to Appium #19799

Updated

  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration
  • Disallow `NaN`s in `Rect` sizes #18971
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, stale
  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, stale, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, platform/tizen, stale, control-dialog, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, stale, Under Consideration
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, stale, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • Correctly handle ContainerView changes #13114
    stale, Under Consideration
  • [X] GetValueSource #19563
    do-not-merge, area/testing
  • Fix condition to bundle Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.dll in app extensions on Apple platforms. Fixes #19756. #19757
  • Fix SetProgressViewOffset on SwipeRefreshLayout #19767
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • [X] don't expand types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area/Xaml </>, stale, Under Consideration
  • Appshell item template #18615
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, stale
  • [Trimming] Fix several trimming warnings #19402
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Expose generic delegates for BindableProperty via Create method #19431
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale
  • Devices.Sensors.Location: rework argument handling in constructors #19459
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Fix legacy logical children to correctly add/remove #17410
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, stale, .NET 9 Planning
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale
  • Consolidate all the test handler construction #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #19472
    area/essentials 🍞, stale
  • Update README.md #19797
    area/docs 📓
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale
  • Enable CA1822 in Core and convert eligible methods to static #19800
  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Add basic docs for ScrollView implementations #19766
    area/layout 🔲
  • [WinUI] Add workaround for Connectivity check on Win10 #19261
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, area/desktop 🖥️, partner/cat 😻
  • [net9.0] Enable tizen #19679
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Add animated GIF support for Image #19411
    area/image :framed_picture:, stale
